09-12-2024: - Camera zooms out a little bit more when un-burrowing
- Can cast Scorn while using {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo
08-15-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn T3 now affects all damage types
08-01-2024: - Updated Mo & Krill {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20}} Burrow start, duration, and end sounds
- Updated Mo & Krill {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast cast sound mix
07-11-2024: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn not healing you against shields
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast base duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast T1 reduced from +2s to +1.5s
06-27-2024: - Base HP regen increased from 2.5 to 3
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn not healing for more with things like Mystic Burst
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20}} Burrow now destroys breakables in its path
- Fixed Healing Booster not applying to {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn's 2x heal multiplier on heroes
- Added a bonus counter to show how much health has been earned by getting a kill during {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo
06-20-2024: - You can now cast items and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn while spinning out of Burrow
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo bonus health per kill increased from 25 to 30
06-13-2024: - Fixed Mo & Krill gaining {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Reactive Barrier|Size=20}} Reactive Barrier buff while channeling the ultimate
- HP Growth per boon reduced from 48 to 42
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo now grants 25 max hp each time a target dies during it
05-30-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast no longer affects bosses
05-23-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn healing against non-heroes reduced from 1x to 0.7x
- Sandblast no longer prevents enemies from reloading while disarmed
05-16-2024: - Moved a truck away from the garage to give wide enough path for {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Mo & Krill|Size=20}} Mo & Krill
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo now uses a new instant cast mechanism. When you are in range there is a valid target indicator.
05-10-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn T3 debuff duration increased from 10s to 16s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Combo|Size=20}} Combo T3 DPS increased from +30 to +40
05-03-2024: - {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast range increased from 25m to 30m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast width increased from 3m to 5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sand Blast|Size=20}} Sand Blast is now permissive with small obstructions in the way
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20}} Burrow no longer loses its state as you change elevations
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Burrow|Size=20}} Burrow now knocks enemies up when you come up
- No longer listed as a recommended new player hero
